title: Sex Kitten
description: After Katarina inadvertently dons a costume that transforms the wearer into a catshifter, can she control the undeniable urges to mate that the outfit brings along with it?(A Cerys du Lys urban fantasy shifter breeding novelette)When faced with the choice of going to a party or being harassed by her friend, Katarina reluctantly chooses the party. Unfortunately, it's a costume party and she has no costume.With few options and little time, Kat decides to check out an antique store nearby. The shop is shady, and the owner is strange, but the woman has plenty of costumes hidden in a back room.Once Kat tries on a sexy catgirl outfit, she feels different, though. She can't quite put her finger on it, isn't sure what's happening, but...Is there something more to this costume, or is it all in her mind? What are these uncontrollable urges, this constant, insistent heat?Can she control her newfound lust, or will it overtake her and turn her into a veritable Sex Kitten?
author: Cerys du Lys
